entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Statically linked cloud native executables and static linking of OpenSSL #80654
  • [API Proposal]: Add T PickRandomly(IReadOnlyList<T> source) #80651
  • Duplicate definition of PaddingFor32 with different cache line size on x86_64 #80650
  • zsh comes up on macOS even though System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.CreateNoWindow is specified as true. #80649
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput.WriteLine does not work properly on macOS. #80648
  • One about foreach and type access #80647
  • Various non-control characters are interpreted as control characters by the console. #80644

Closed

  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Missing flags on tree"' during 'Assertion prop' for recently added RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan uses #80632
    8.0.0
  • Alpine 3.17 images causes SSL Error "unsafe legacy renegotiation disabled" #80641
  • Static constructor on an interface is not invoked #80538

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle float/double for RVA[cns] optimization in fgValueNumberConstLoad #80661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] debugger tests- Misc improvements #80660
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Fix implicit byref block expansion #80659
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger]Disable test which is getting stuck #80658
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Quote illink substitutions path #80657
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Avoid emitting the eh info table, its not used on wasm. #80653
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix indexing of correlated diagnostic binaries #80652
  • Switch to using the .NET SDK properties that are defined to provide the TFM instead of using the assembly that defines System.Object #80646
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, tenet-performance, source-generator
  • Be more conservative with peephole optimization #80645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove duplicate function #80643
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix nested non-byref like VC with no pointer fields #80642
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Avoid using a null heap to decommit the mark array #80640
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Change TrimMode setting for templates, and tests #80639
    area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Add support for llvm linker (lld) #80613
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix GC hole in newly added test #80630
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Remove forward slash in trimmer args #80631
    area-Build-mono
  • Set FieldSeq in CreateSpan for field handle #80622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow eliminating virtual methods on abstract classes #80607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add additional IG assertion checking #80599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Fix errors from lowercase OS names #80629
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline

Updated

  • [wasm] Enable dedup by default. #80260
    area-Build-mono
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some low-hanging HWIntrinsic issues #80626
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP - NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update our inline observations to special case a few more intrinsics #80637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] make default initial memory size 16MB #80507
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Run library tests with v8 --experimental-wasm-eh #80271
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • allow to set custom serial speed on Linux #80534
    os-linux, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Log msquic version and commit hash to event log and to test output. #80612
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Changed handle table scanning so that we would scan all slots for any heap count we may have. #80541
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add ability statically link OpenSSL #80380
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Strip all symbols on macOS as well #80515
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Expand bblocks reordering with common patterns to facilitate propagation of values #80362
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add type loader support for resolving static virtuals #80601
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Generate fewer templates for generic virtual methods #80600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add tests for exercising certificates with platform provider keys #80558
    area-System.Security
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix NET 7.0 streamed http response reading #80638
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Add logger and tests for xml parsing in NativeAOT #80470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: outstanding tasks #2169

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: dispatch #2145
  • Fix most warnings for the `HelloWasm` runtime test #2168

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable projects to use the SDK `TargetFramework` #29949

Closed

  • .NET 3.1 Installer Questions #4029

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29945
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • This call is failing on the Darwin leg in installer. (#29916) #29938

Updated

  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
  • Update GenerateLayout.targets for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers packaging structure changes #29906
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0180 false positive (resulting in non-compilable code) #66427
    Backlog
  • Compilation fails when pattern matching and DoesNotReturnIf are combined #66426
  • [Enhancement] Generate code between functions is tabbed up to tab level #66424

PullRequests

Created

  • Instrumentation state #66429
  • Remove position argument that is already present in the syntax context #66428
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2088372 #66423

Merged

  • Delete Compilers.sln and keep only Compilers.slnf #65802
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Allow specifying expected IL verification baseline #66316
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add test showing incorrect sequence point placement #66363
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Allow multiple documents in method debug info #66359
    Area-Interactive, Pending director approval

Updated

  • Prototype of how to potentially add `using alias = type` to the language. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Adding keyword recommendations after FileKeyword #66357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Different behaviour of discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix mismatched per-language option storages #66421
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure event handler generation and navigation in webforms works properly #66394
    Area-IDE
  • Fix reading VB editor options from ISettingsManager (17.4) #66398
    Area-IDE, Pending director approval
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix DateTime item's description in different culture #66420
    Area-IDE
  • Emit copy when calling non-readonly method with ref readonly field receiver #66351
    Area-Compilers
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Question] interoperability of Redis backplane, with Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR #46105
  • Azure B2C logout endpoint does not redirect to the post_logout_redirect_uri when logout performed in YARP middleware #46104
  • Blazor User.Identity seems to be null #46102
  • avoid to render whole application in startup #46101
  • Blazor Hotrelopad generic #46100
  • Duplicate logging ID and name in health checks #46099

Closed

  • Perf improvement: caching #46081
  • Please consider adding multipart-form-data #46103
  • Browser is flooded with Correlation and Nonce cookies after logging into Azure. #46053
  • [Blazor] Allow component resx files to be named razor.resx to allow nesting #46051
  • Using SignalR in Unity - The method or operation is not implemented #45586
  • Put the query parameters into RouteData.RouteValues #46047
  • Conflicting assembly reference causing the application to break #45068
    Discussions
  • DistributedSession always loads session in CommitAsync even when session is not modified #42009
    6.0.x
  • `Challenge` vs `ChallengeResult` #46076

PullRequests

Updated

  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Flags enum provided as list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution
  • string.Split to Span.Split #46098
    Perf
  • Fix Blazor PageContext disposal #46097
    area-blazor
  • Update tests to reflect change of web app manifest extension in React C# template #43765
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43756
    area-mvc, community-contribution, .NET 8 Planning
  • Run test on Linux and Mac #45642
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Wrong replication of resource names in embedded file provider #46067
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Call CloseAsync instead of CloseOutputAsync in the browser #46012
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • fix trace id value, introduce traceparent #44680
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android.Util.AndroidRuntimeException: 'Only the original thread that created a view hierarchy can touch its views.' #12670
  • Changing Content property of ShellContent doesn't change visual content. #12669
  • But what if I want to use Maui to create a normal exe? #12668
  • Where is toolbox? #12667
  • error 0x80070005 #12666
  • Don't run #12665
  • Difficult installation #12664
  • How to disable bitcode strip for Google Sign In ? #12663
  • Exception when trying content popout to new window for CollectionView #12662
  • Xaml compiler removes xaml-only Resources from Release builds #12659

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix top margin modal #12661
  • Cache grid cell measurements to avoid re-measures on second pass #12660

Updated

  • Propagate VisualElement.IsEnabled to children #12488

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Order of relationship vs navigation configuration when using ApplyConfigurationsFromAssembly #30068
  • OWNED BY <column> Sequences not scaffolded in a database first scenario #30067
  • Redundant Collection Conversion #30065

Closed

  • Creating a Migration of a derived context in another project than the base context-project crashes #16803
  • EF Core Cosmos query on owned child collection (simple question) #30064
  • EFCore 7.0.0 - Graph of entity insertion throws a FK exception #29741
    7.0.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove regex from SqlServerMigrationsSqlGenerator #30069
  • #30065: remove ToArray and ToList calls #30066

Updated

  • Sequence cache support #29716
